Reference

All functions

coef(<susie>)

extract regression coefficients from susie fit

compute_MXt()

Compute M%*%t(scaled.X) using sparse multiplication

compute_Xty()

Compute t(scaled.X)%*%y using sparse multiplication

compute_ss()

Compute the needed summary statistics for `susie_ss` from the 'raw' data

estimate_residual_variance()

Estimate residual variance

estimate_residual_variance_ss()

Estimate residual variance for summary statistics

predict(<susie>)

predict future observations or extract coefficients from susie fit

single_effect_regression()

Bayesian single-effect linear regression of Y on X

single_effect_regression_ss()

Bayesian single-effect linear regression of Y on X.

summary(<susie>)

summarize susie fit

susie()

SUm of Single Effect (SuSiE) Regression of Y on X

susie_auto()

An attempt to automate reliable running of susie even on hard problems

susie_bhat()

Summary statistics version of SuSiE on betahat, the corresponding standard error, and correlation (or covariance) matrix

susie_get_cs()

Extract credible sets from SuSiE fit

susie_get_lfsr()

Local false sign rate (lfsr) for susie credible sets

susie_get_objective()

Get evidence lower bound (ELBO) from fitted SuSiE model

susie_get_pip()

Compute posterior inclusion probability (PIP) for all variables

susie_get_prior_variance()

Get updated prior variance

susie_get_residual_variance()

Get updated residual variance

susie_init_coef()

initialize a susie object using regression coefficients

susie_plot()

Plot per variable summary in SuSiE CSs

susie_plot_iteration()

Diagnostic plot for SuSiE iterations

susie_ss()

Bayesian sum of single-effect (susie) linear regression using summary stat

susie_trendfilter()

perform trend filtering using SuSiE

susie_z()

Summary statistics version of SuSiE on z scores and correlation (or covariance) matrix.

update_each_effect()

update each effect once

update_each_effect_ss()

update each effect once
